## Jun 28, 2019

Some tourist sites in Chicago

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
chicagoIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "https://cdn.dribbble.com/users/1555045/screenshots/3377067/chicagodribble.png",
  iconWidth = 31*215/230, iconHeight = 31,
  iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16
)
chicagoSites <- c(
  "<a href='https://www.artic.edu/'>Art Institute of Chicago</a>",
  "<a href='http://www.fieldmuseum.org/'>Field Museum</a>",
  "<a href='https://www.msichicago.org/'>Museum of Science+Industry Chicago</a>",
  "<a href='https://www.mcachicago.org/'>Museum of Contemporary Art Chicago</a>"
)
chicagoLatLong <- data.frame(
  lat = c(41.8796, 41.8663, 41.7906, 41.8972),
  lng = c(-87.6237, -87.6170, -87.5831, -87.6213))
chicagoLatLong %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(icon = chicagoIcon, popup = chicagoSites)
```
